QuestData.Title: Breaking into the Trap Game
QuestData.Description: When we came through the portal, we weren't able to bring any of our animals with us. For us to produce leather and furs, we'll need to trap some of the native beasts and bring them back here.$B$BWe can get a load of leather from the elekk, or furs from the talbuk, right here in Shadowmoon.$B$BTake this iron trap and use it on a wounded adult talbuk or elekk, then bring the trap on back here and we'll start a work order.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Iron Trap to capture an Elekk or Talbuk in Shadowmoon Valley and then place a Work Order at your Barn.
